entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
